title: WLC was right,Tim Keller and Anthony Kronman Explain why Materialists have trouble with meaning
description:
Right after I upload a video today where I critique William Lane Craig's use of eternity as a critique of meaninglessness I watch this Veritas Forum where Anthony Kronman pretty much says he went from materialist to pagan because of eternity. https://youtu.be/23xFpUD72DE

Tim Keller wades in and in his first point critques materialists and in the second I think critiques Jordan Peterson's ideas a bit.
